summary:
“Iron Man 2″ Keyframe Art - 

Adi Granov  "Well, long term, I want them to put me in the Pentagon for the next 25 years. I want...
caption:
“Iron Man 2″ Keyframe Art -  Adi Granov

“Well, long term, I want them to put me in the Pentagon for the next 25 years. I want to make Iron Man look like an antique. I wanna go to that Stark Expo, I wanna take a dump in Tony Stark’s front yard. You know what I’m talking about?”

blog.name: ao3feed-stony
blog.title: Tony Stark/Steve Rogers
blog.description: stony ao3 fan fic rss feed

summary: it’s a thin line (between love and hate)
title: it’s a thin line (between love and hate)
body:
by WillowsAndWastelands

Steve and Tony hate everything about each other. They would swear it on everything they own.

But if that’s so true, then why the hell can’t they live without one another?

Or, alternatively titled, how these two dumbasses realized they were so, so wrong. And how they kind-of, sort-of, most definitely fell in love along the way.

Words: 3010, Chapters: 1/5, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, Iron Man (Movies), Captain America - All Media Types
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Clint Barton, Thor (Marvel), Pepper Potts
  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Enemies to Friends to Lovers, Mutual Pining, Angst, Angst with a Happy Ending, Hurt/Comfort, We Love Our Dumbasses!, Slow Burn, Feelings Realization

blog.name: ao3feed-stony
blog.title: Tony Stark/Steve Rogers
blog.description: stony ao3 fan fic rss feed

summary: In Your Eyes (Universes are Made and Unmade)
title: In Your Eyes (Universes are Made and Unmade)
body:
by avengertonys

“Big man in a suit of armour. Take that off, what are you?”

It was a fair question. Tony Stark had carefully cultivated the image that he showed the world, had constructed his façade piece by piece over the years until it could be considered its own kind of protection. Few people had ever seen the real Tony, and fewer people still were ever allowed to know him. It was a defence mechanism, a way of keeping himself safe from the threats that the outside world presented.

He’d flown far too close to the sun before, knew that allowing himself the luxury of company would only end in a crash, in the water working its way into his lungs. Choking, choking, choking.

So, when he finds himself lost amongst the stars, he expects this to be the end. His life will end not in water but in darkness.

The stars have other plans.

For under the armour, Tony Stark is not a genius, billionaire, playboy philanthropist.

Under the armour, Tony Stark is human.

Under the armour, Tony Stark is fragile.

Under the armour, Tony Stark is the universe.

Words: 1723, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

Series: Part 1 of Lessons from the Cosmos

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, Captain America (Movies), Iron Man (Movies), Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Avengers Team (MCU), Hydra Agents, Jane Foster (Marvel), Loki (Marvel), Pepper Potts, SHIELD Agents & Staff, Thanos (Marvel)

  • Additional Tags: Aftermath of Torture, Angst & Humour, Anxiety Attacks, Blood and Torture, Brainwashing, Canon Divergence - Post-Avengers (2012), Depression, Eventual Fluff, Eventual Happy Ending, Canon-Typical Violence, Howard Stark’s A+ Parenting, Hurt/Comfort, Idiots in Love, Mind Control Aftermath & Recovery, Mutant Tony Stark, Past Child Abuse, Past Rape/Non-con, Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder - PTSD, Post-Avengers (2012), Recovery, Friends to Lovers, Team as Family, Unhealthy Coping Mechanisms, Implied/Referenced Alcohol Abuse/Alcoholism, Suicidal Thoughts, Tags May Change

blog.name: ao3feed-stony
blog.title: Tony Stark/Steve Rogers
blog.description: stony ao3 fan fic rss feed

summary: Shoot me out of sight
title: Shoot me out of sight
body:
by S_Horne

“Oh!” Tony cried out beautifully, his voice high with surprise. “That’s not my leg.”

“No,” Steve said into Tony’s neck, “it’s not. Is it okay?”

Tony let out a high-pitched whine and Steve grinned, nipping a dark hickey before pulling away. “Tony? Is it okay?”

“Yes,” Tony panted out, his hands fisting and spreading on Steve’s back as if he didn’t know what to do with them. “Yes, please. Please, Steve.”

OR

National Strawberries and Cream Day

by Anonymous

“M’ never gonna like anyone else’s drinks,” Peter mumbles, equally drunk on sleep and Bailey’s. “You’ve ruined me.”

“I haven’t ruined you,” Tony says, thinking, yet.

summary: Little Orphan Spider
title: Little Orphan Spider
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2Wg15c5

by FatandNerdy30

Peter Parker is an orphan living in a group home in Queens after both his aunt and uncle were murdered in a robbery gone wrong.
His life gets better at night when he becomes Spider-Man, helping all the little people who need him.
And then Tony Stark comes in and messes it all up with a publicity stunt, offering Peter a chance to stay with him for two months..Now Peter has to figure out how to keep his secret safe, since it seems every Avenger is after Spider-Man!

Words: 831, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017)
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Peter Parker, Pepper Potts, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Steve Rogers, Clint Barton, Sam Wilson (Marvel), James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Martin Li
  • Relationships: Peter Parker/Tony Stark, Pepper Potts/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Father-Son Relationship, Mother-Son Relationship, Family


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2Wg15c5
